definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: Take a woman with a 27-inch waist.
sentences.chinese: 以一位腰围27英寸的女士为例。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a pinstriped suit with a 34 waist.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一套腰围34细条纹的西装。

sentences.english: Researchers have found a number of ways that fat people could influence their pals' girth.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员已经发现了胖人们影响朋友腰围的种种途径。

sentences.english: Weeks of exercise succeeded in trimming down her waistline.
sentences.chinese: 几周的锻炼使她的腰围小了一圈。

sentences.english: Middle age is when broadness of mind and narrowness of waist change places.
sentences.chinese: 人到中年就是思想的宽度和腰围的纤度对调。

sentences.english: In the bedroom, Scarlett is having Mammie measure her waist.
sentences.chinese: 在卧室，奶妈在给思嘉量腰围。

sentences.english: My husband and I have been married for five years and you can tell by our waistlines.
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫结婚已经五年了，从我们的腰围就能看出来。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, that also means an increasing waistline and wider hips as the years go by.
sentences.chinese: 非常不幸的这意味着日渐增加的腰围和臀围。

sentences.english: Don"t you think my waistline is getting smaller?
sentences.chinese: 你不认为我的腰围变得越来越小了吗？

sentences.english: Please catch in the waistline slightly.
Reduce waistline, thus shaping next abdomen form shape, make the waist and fine.
sentences.chinese: 减少腰围，从而塑造下腹部的形状，使腰部纤细。

sentences.english: Owing to my girth he could never have closed them about me lower.
sentences.chinese: 由于我腰围很大，他不可能在往下的身体部位挟住我。

sentences.english: What does your waistline say about your health?
sentences.chinese: 你的腰围透露着关于你健康的什么信息？

sentences.english: That is why waist-to-hip ratio is more reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么腰围与臀围的比例更加可靠。

definition: thin/to lose weight/(of clothing) tight/(of meat) lean/(of land) unproductive
height (of person)/length of clothing from shoulders to bottom (tailor or dressmaker's measure)
